title: Pixel 3 Phone freezes few minutes after disconnecting from charger. Responds only if reconnected.
content:
MY Pixel 3 Phone freezes few minutes after disconnecting   from charger.
.Does not respond unless I connect back the phone to the charger again. 
Once I reconnect the charger back , it works fine. 
Due to this I am missing calls  and internet access . This phone is hardly is less than 18 months old and is out of warranty now.  Any suggestions ?
